Achieve stunning, long-lasting color with the **Koleston Supreme** hair dye, designed to deliver intense color that lasts up to 8 weeks. Featuring deep-infusion technology and micro-fine pigments, **Koleston Supreme** penetrates the hair to provide a captivating and vibrant hue.

The kit includes a special Color Reactivator to boost color intensity after 15 days, along with two sachets of Intense Gloss Treatment to lock in color and protect your hair. Enjoy vibrant color and superior care with every use.

‚≠ê Rich, long-lasting color intensity
‚≠ê Deep moisture thanks to advanced technology
‚≠ê Easy application in simple steps: Squeeze, Mix, Apply
‚≠ê Color Reactivator revives color vibrancy after 15 days
‚≠ê Dual care treatments on Day 1 and Day 30

üîπ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Supreme**:
Preparation:
‚≠ê Squeeze the dye tube into a non-metallic bowl, add the developer and mix well with a color brush.
‚≠ê Apply the mixture to your hair immediately after blending.
First-time coloring:
‚≠ê Apply the mixture to unwashed hair using the color brush, ensuring all strands are covered.
‚≠ê Use a wide-tooth comb to distribute the color evenly.
Root coloring:
‚≠ê Create partings in your hair and apply the colored emulsion to the roots.
‚≠ê Leave for 20 minutes, then distribute the colored emulsion evenly through the rest of your hair.
Processing time:
‚≠ê Leave the color on the hair for a total of 30 minutes.
Finishing:
‚≠ê Rinse hair until water runs clear (shampoo is not recommended).
‚≠ê Apply the first sachet of Intense Gloss Treatment, leave for 2 minutes, then rinse again.
After 15 days:
‚≠ê Wear gloves and apply the Color Re-Activator to wet hair, wait 10 minutes, then rinse and style as usual.
After 30 days:
‚≠ê Apply the second sachet of Miracle Gloss Treatment, wait 2 minutes, then rinse and style as usual.

üîπ Ingredients of **Koleston Supreme**:
‚≠ê Micro-fine coloring agents for rich, deep color.
‚≠ê Nourishing oils for hair hydration.
‚≠ê Color Reactivator for enhancing hair vibrancy.
‚≠ê Intense Gloss Treatment ingredients to lock in color and protect hair.

Description:

‚≠ê Oil Replacement Treatment for post-coloration nourishment.

üîπ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Platinum Blonde + Developer 310/0**:

Preparation:
‚≠ê Press the content of the tube into a non-metallic dish.
‚≠ê Add the developer fluid and mix the two ingredients with a coloring brush until thoroughly combined.

First-Time Coloring:
‚≠ê Apply to unwashed hair using the coloring brush.
‚≠ê Ensure you do not miss any strands.
‚≠ê Comb your hair through with a wide-toothed comb for even distribution.

Root Coloring:
‚≠ê Make partings in your hair and apply the coloring emulsion to the roots.
‚≠ê Leave for 20 minutes then comb the coloring emulsion evenly right down to the ends of your hair.

Development Time:
‚≠ê Leave to soak for 30 minutes.

Finish:

Caution & Warnings:
‚≠ê Wear suitable gloves.
‚≠ê Mixing ratio: 1:1.
‚≠ê Conduct an allergy alert test 48 hours before each use.
‚≠ê Do not use to dye eyelashes or eyebrows.
‚≠ê Keep out of reach of children.

Description:
Introducing **Koleston Maxi** Hair Color in Special Silver Blonde Nature 312, for an irresistible, intense color that lasts up to 8 weeks. Our Deep-Infusion Technology and micro-fine color molecules penetrate maximally for stunning, eye-catching results. The **Koleston Maxi** kit includes an exclusive 15-day color-refreshing cream to deposit more color for that undeniable intensity. ‚≠ê Deep Moisturization Step
‚≠ê Water Protection Factor for More Color Intensity

üîπ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Maxi**:

Preparation:
‚≠ê Squeeze the color cream tube into the applicator bottle.
‚≠ê Close the bottle and shake until the mixture is completely blended.

Application Options:
For Frequent Coloration (Every 1-3 Months) with the Same Shade:
‚≠ê Leave hair unwashed and dry.
‚≠ê Apply to roots first.
‚≠ê Wait for 30-40 minutes.
‚≠ê Apply the color to the rest of the hair for 10 minutes.

For Full Head Application / Root Touch-Up:

After Finishing:

After 30 Days (Shine Treatment):

‚≠ê Wait for 2 minutes.
‚≠ê Rinse your hair and style as usual.

Warnings & Precautions:

‚≠ê Do not use to color eyelashes or eyebrows.

‚≠ê In case of any reaction or if in doubt, consult a doctor before using any hair coloring product.
‚≠ê Keep out of reach of children.
‚≠ê Do not color your hair if you have a facial rash or sensitive, irritated, damaged scalp, have ever experienced any reaction after coloring your hair, or have experienced a reaction to a temporary black henna tattoo.

‚≠ê Color Reactivator: Restores richness & vibrancy of color after 15 days.

üîπ Usage Instructions for **Koleston Maxi Hair Color Golden Fall 308/03**

Preparation:
‚≠ê Squeeze the dye tube liquid into the developer bottle.
‚≠ê Close the bottle and shake it until completely blended.

Application Options:
If you color your hair frequently (1 to 3 months) with similar tone:
‚≠ê Leave hair unwashed and dry.
‚≠ê Apply to roots first.
‚≠ê Wait 30-40 minutes.
‚≠ê Apply dye to the rest of your hair.
‚≠ê Wait for 10 minutes.

Apply all over starting at roots:
‚≠ê Leave hair unwashed and dry.
‚≠ê Apply to roots first and work through all hair to the tips.
‚≠ê Wait 40-50 minutes.

Finish:
‚≠ê Rinse until water runs clear (using shampoo is not recommended).

After 15 days: Reactivate your color:
‚≠ê Using gloves, apply the Day 15 Color Re-Activator to wet hair.
‚≠ê Wait 10 minutes.
‚≠ê Rinse and style your hair as usual.

After 30 days: Condition your hair:
‚≠ê Apply the 2nd sachet of Miracle Gloss Treatment.
‚≠ê Wait 2 minutes.
‚≠ê Rinse and style your hair as usual.

Caution & Warnings:
‚≠ê Wear suitable gloves.
‚≠ê Mixing ratio: 1:1.
‚≠ê Hair colorants can cause severe allergic reactions. Conduct an allergy alert test 48 hours before each time you color.
‚≠ê Do not use to dye eyelashes or eyebrows.
‚≠ê Keep out of reach of children.

Name: KillyS Coconut Oil Hairbrush for Low Porosity Hair
Description:
Every hair enthusiast knows that hair care is a challenge, and care tailored to your hair's porosity is your first step to achieving a 'good hair day.'

The **KillyS Coconut Oil Hairbrush for Low Porosity Hair** is the perfect complement to your hair care routine, specifically designed for those with low porosity hair.

‚≠ê The fine nylon pins combined with integrated bristles effectively comb and smoothen your hair.
‚≠ê While combing, the brush pins gently massage your scalp and stimulate blood circulation, promoting scalp health.
‚≠ê The coconut oil infused in the brush bristles lasts for approximately 6 months of use, imparting shine and softness to your hair.
‚≠ê If you have fine hair that tends to get greasy, try combing your hair from the ear downwards to avoid a floppy, greasy hair-style effect.

**Do you already know what your hair porosity is?**
*   **Low porosity hair:** Has closed scales, making it smooth, slippery, and lacking volume. Styling can be a bit challenging.
*   **Medium porosity hair:** The most common hair type, with slightly split scales, meaning it's not perfectly smooth and is slightly puffy.
*   **High porosity hair:** Has severely split scales, making it prone to frizz and breakage.

üîπ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Coconut Oil Hairbrush for Low Porosity Hair**:
‚≠ê Suitable for all hair types, our hairbrush gently massages the scalp while safeguarding your hair from damage.
‚≠ê Whether on dry or wet hair, it effortlessly brushes your hair, ensuring a soothing and effective grooming experience.
‚≠ê Remember to start brushing from the ends and work your way up to the roots for gentle detangling.
‚≠ê Clean the hairbrush regularly with warm water and mild shampoo, gently removing any hair or product buildup.
‚≠ê Allow the brush to air dry completely before using it again.
‚≠ê Store the hairbrush in a clean, dry place to maintain its quality.
‚≠ê Store in a dry place away from sunlight.

üîπ Ingredients of **KillyS Coconut Oil Hairbrush for Low Porosity Hair**:
‚≠ê Acrylonitrile butadiene styrene 58%
‚≠ê Thermoplastic rubber 30%
‚≠ê Nylon Bristles 10%
‚≠ê Epoxy 2%
